ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: +AD4-my point is he could steal every +AD4-Tae spawn if he wanted too... Actually he couldn t, if a person is stealing the tae every time he usually gets
ygData.messageBody:
my point is he could steal every
Tae spawn if he wanted too...

Actually he couldn't, if a person is stealing the tae every time he usually gets reported, and everytime ive seen this happen, the person recieves a warning from a GM.

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-
-----Original Message-----
From: Diina, David DDiina+AEA-turn-keywny.com
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Thursday, August 05, 1999 4:47 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Gob Pets in Oasis?


From: +ACI-Diina, David+ACI- DDiina+AEA-turn-keywny.com

Hast told me he split the ruby with other people who were there...but
obviously he kept the Metallic Robe for himself.....so Jason, are you saying
that you were the GM that was controlling Archeon?? I don't know Hast well
but he has always given me the perception that he is an honest helpful
person.....he spends a lot of his time taking his turn on the templar and
diviner.....I know most people think a lvl 50 should spend there time doing
something that is more there lvl like the fear plane .....but he told me he
is getting stuff for his guild mates.....my point is he could steal every
Tae spawn if he wanted too...but not only does he not steal, he makes sure
no one else steals......usually two or three groups are there and when it is
your turn he tells you.....the one day the only reason I was there was to
get a lizard scale cloak, didn't want ruby, and I was talking to Hast and I
told him this....the next thing I know there was a Lizard scale cloak in my
trade window with the trade button already pushed....he said +ACI-here so you
don't have to sit here and waste your time waiting for the tae's to spawn.+ACI-
He had told me he had two he was saving for guild members, but he was prolly
going to get a bunch more so he just gave me one......so you guys be the
judge....

Sorry for getting off the topic of the list....

Brennin

-----Original Message-----
From: A Good Egg +AFs-mailto:douglas+AEA-speakeasy.org+AF0-
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 4:13 PM
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Gob Pets in Oasis?

From: A Good Egg douglas+AEA-speakeasy.org

On Thu, 5 Aug 1999, Treadway, Donald wrote:

From: +ACI-Treadway, Donald+ACI- DTreadway+AEA-alldata.net

In fact it was Brian Hook, formerly of Quake 3 fame who
ran that event. The
thing that disgusts me is that that wizard told everyone
that the Archon
dropped nothing. It took everyone in the zone to deal
with the mob's and
the Archon, and this guy not only has the gall to keep the
loot all to
himself, but also to lie about what he got. Gives all
wizards a bad name,
oh, wait, they already have that, don't they.

Ummm, what are you talking about? Hast apparently DID tell
people what
he got, since that was reported in the e-mail to which you
replied. And
while you might be magnaminous enough to share, most people
actually
keep the stuff they earn.

Though I imagine Hast probably shared the rubicite, since
it's not
exactly stuff he can wear. +AD0-)


--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them
behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the
smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
